definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: We write to each other often, even though we are a great distance apart.
sentences.chinese: 即使是相隔万水千山，我们也频繁书信往来。

sentences.english: The ions, 40 micrometers apart, float above the surface of the trap.
sentences.chinese: 离子之间相隔40微米，漂浮在势阱表面。

sentences.english: The ten years between them yawned like a hundred .
sentences.chinese: 虽只相隔了十年，他们却感觉象是一百年。

sentences.english: You can easily work from home and/or with people thousands of miles away.
sentences.chinese: 你在家中就能很轻松地和与你相隔千里之外的人工作。

sentences.english: Imagine a desert with two pools of water separated by some distance.
sentences.chinese: 试想一片沙漠里只有两个池塘，而且还相隔老远。

sentences.english: The boulders are quite widely separated and much interstitial mud is visible.
sentences.chinese: 这些漂砾彼此相隔较远并有许多填隙泥。

sentences.english: Finally, roc although abandon the gest of jade, but already with be apart of green yin and yang.
sentences.chinese: 最后，鹏虽废玉之武功，但已与青阴阳相隔。

sentences.english: More than a month, plastic apart with the jamie meet at last.
sentences.chinese: 相隔一个多月，朔与亚纪终于见面了。

sentences.english: The two events are separated in time by one hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 这两事件在时间上相隔一百年。

sentences.english: Five feet apart they paused as if by mutual consent .
sentences.chinese: 相隔五步路，大家就不约而同的站住脚跟。

sentences.english: Q2: Approximately how many years were there between Abraham and Moses?
sentences.chinese: 亚巴郎和梅瑟大约相隔多久？

sentences.english: This is not the distance between the sea and the sky, just missing the height up apart.
sentences.chinese: 海与天之间本没有距离，相隔的只是仰头思念的高度。

sentences.english: You could book a connecting room presidential suitedeluxe suite.
sentences.chinese: 您可以预定以门相隔的连房总统套房豪华套房。

sentences.english: In heart's perspective the distance looms large.
sentences.chinese: 在心的前景里，那相隔的间隔显得更空阔了。

sentences.english: He's too long after their death.
sentences.chinese: 他们之间年代相隔久远。

sentences.english: Areoles spaced far apart in notches along wings or angles.
sentences.chinese: 小窠在翅或角上的凹缺上相隔较远地分布。

definition: distance apart/separated by a given distance
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
to look at one another/to face each other
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
to be almost within reach/to be close at hand
to see each other/to meet in person
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
